## Exercise 0.4: new note

Create a similar diagram depicting the situation where the user creates a new note on page https://fullstack-exampleapp.herokuapp.com/notes
by writing something into the text field and clicking the submit button.

#### Resolution
![alt text] (https://www.websequencediagrams.com/cgi-bin/cdraw?&s=rose, "Diagram of the new notes situation")

## Exercise 0.5: SPA
Create a diagram depicting the situation where the user goes to the single page app version of the notes app at https://fullstack-exampleapp.herokuapp.com/spa.

#### Resolution

## Exercise 0.6:  New note SPA
Create a diagram depicting the situation, where user creates a new note using the single page version of the app.
This was the last exercise, and it's time to push your answers to GitHub and mark the exercises as done in the submission application.
